entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
